events.message: Customer filed a claim reporting an accident involving their car hitting a tree on April 30.
The claim was categorized as an auto accident claim based on the description and keywords.
An agent was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their auto accident claim.
Customer was sent a confirmation that their car accident claim is officially acknowledged.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple repair shop quotes.
Investigation team initiated a review of the collision details and verified submitted documents.
Completed investigation confirmed the claim details and validated the repair costs submitted.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on verified damage and policy coverage.
Customer responded with appreciation for timely handling and agreed to the proposed settlement.
Claim approved by management after customer accepted the settlement offer for their vehicle accident.
Payment was issued promptly to the customerâ€™s bank account covering the agreed settlement on damages.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after payment was successfully processed and received.
